description:
At The Law Office of James H. Wood PC in Albuquerque, New Mexico, our only focus is helping you get your life back after a serious injury. We know how devastating it can be to not only suffer physically, but also have serious worries about your future. Our mission is to give you peace of mind and secure the compensation you need to cover medical bills, losses and other damages.

Since we opened our law office, we have secured millions of dollars on behalf of people who have experienced the following:

  • Medical malpractice, nursing home abuse and wrongful death
  • Car, trucking, motorcycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Traumatic brain injury, burn injury and birth injuries
  • Injuries due to dangerous drugs and defective products

Our practice includes an attorney whom the National Board of Trial Advocacy has certified as a civil law trial specialist. Additionally, as a result of our customer focus and remarkable results, we hold honors such as being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100; earning the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell; and being selected for inclusion in the Super Lawyers list.

Every case at The Law Office of James H. Wood PC begins with a free initial consultation. During that time, we have the opportunity to listen to our client's situation and assess how we can help. Moving forward, we take calls around the clock to alleviate our clients' concerns. When your case is with us, you can rest assured that you are in capable, compassionate hands.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
